data.actual_result: The emojis fail to copy over
data.expected_result: Emojis copied through Discord's copy option should be copied like when using ctrl + c
data.short_description: Emojis in embeds cannot be copied with the right-click option
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a bot send an embed with emojis (can be custom or default) and some text in a field value - Highlight the emojis and text - Right-click over the text (so you don't attempt to copy the emoji's link) and click copy - Paste what you copied into your text field and observe
